object.name: CarMixerSettings
object.description: Settings for the @ref ActuatorModule that controls the channel assignments for the mixer based on AircraftType

field.name: Mixer1Vector
field.description: Mixer vector. All of these values are in Q7 form (e.g. 128 represents 100 percent). Values over 100% are not recommended because of implementation details. These represent the values that are multplied by each of the axis commands to determine actuator output.

field.name: Mixer2Vector
field.description: Mixer vector. All of these values are in Q7 form (e.g. 128 represents 100 percent). Values over 100% are not recommended because of implementation details. These represent the values that are multplied by each of the axis commands to determine actuator output.
